summary: Adds a total of 9 followers, one from each hold, wearing their uniforms but no helmets.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]


This mod was a request for a group of followers, one from each hold, wearing their uniforms but no helmets. Here are the finest soldiers each hold has to offer!

All of these people are essential and have skills on a particular weapon. They can be found right outside their hold capital's gates. The guards from holds lacking walls (like Falkreath) can be found outside their Jarl's residence.

Here's the list of followers available:

- Fralvia, an Imperial in Windhelm (Eastmarch hold), unique in the fact that I tried to make her a dual-wielder, currently has daggers.
- Tralen, a Redguard in Markarth (The Reach hold), uses warhammers.
- Ergnin, a Nord in Winterhold (Winterhold hold), uses greatswords.
- Ulfgard, a Nord in Solitude (Haafingar hold), uses battleaxes.
- Ernand, a Breton in Morthal (Hjaalmarch hold), uses war axes.
- Dandre, a Breton in Riften (The Rift hold), uses bows.
- Svogre, a Nord in Dawnstar (The Pale hold), uses swords.
- Iulus, an Imperial in Falkreath (Falkreath hold), uses bows.
- Alfhed, a Nord in Whiterun (Whiterun hold), uses maces.

For some reason, while testing, the followers from Winterhold and Riften could cower in a corner if a dragon or any enemy appeared. I don't know why, since their aggression levels and everything else is set correctly. They will defend you and fight alongside you once you take them with you, however.

To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your 'SteamSteamAppsCommonSkyrimData' folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp. Let me know if there are any problems!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
